attributes.action: Get all teachers in the priority category to be vaccinated
attributes.additional_details: Children need the routine and structure of school. Parents cant teach them as they would learn in school and as a key worker who needs to work it is very hard juggling school live lessons with working and I am scared for my childrens future and believe they will be behind where they should be if schools do not reopen soon. Teachers deserve to go to their work place feeling safe and protected. Teachers should be considered important key workers like nhs and social care staff.
attributes.background: Education is a massive part of a childs life and development and I believe they need to be in schools for their social as well as mental health. Teachers should be protected so we can get them back in schools as soon as possible.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/554316
